title: Understanding the Sum Function
text: The sum function is a powerful tool in spreadsheets that allows you to quickly add up a range of numbers. It can save you time compared to adding each number individually.

title: Highlighting a Range
text: To highlight a range, click and drag your mouse over the cells you want to include. This will select all the cells in that range.

hintAnswer: Highlight the range, then apply the sum function.
title: Applying the Sum Function
text: Once you have highlighted the range, you can apply the sum function to calculate the total of all the numbers in that range.
choices: Highlight the range, then apply the sum function
